As I hear our British authority plans to reduce our military contingent in Iraq from 8,5 to 3 thousand soldiers. How quick we've conceded this point! Wherever is our vaunted strength and heroism? In fact we own to full defeat. We cultivate terrorism, demonstrating our vulnerability instead of trampling on foe. As the phrase goes, business is business. And of course, behaviour of that sort will not recommend us. Moreover, it provokes new claims on the part of Islam terrorism and, thus ... new acts of terror on our territory.
 
 ___________
 Any war is a time of tribulation

post_info.post_title: It's wrong but you can't help laughing.

As I hear our British authority plans to reduce our military contingent in Iraq from 8,5 to 3 thousand soldiers...
Indeed there appear to be such plans. You are nearly two weeks late in hearing about them though: they leaked just days after the bombings in London earlier this month (http://www.washingtonpost.com/wp-dyn/content/article/2005/07/10/AR2005071000725.html)
Surely this was planned well before 7/7.

Surely this was planned well before 7/7.

 
 Yes, I think we have been planning an exit strategy since before we even went into Iraq;)
